description.plain: Swedish pop artist, known as Neiked, stylized as NEIKED. His 2016 song “Sexual” reached a peak position of number 32 on the Swedish Singles Chart and 5 on the UK Singles Chart.

body.plain: Swedish pop artist, known as Neiked, stylized as NEIKED. His 2016 song “Sexual” reached a peak position of number 32 on the Swedish Singles Chart and 5 on the UK Singles Chart.

songs.title: Sexual

description.plain:
The artist is named Neiked and the song is titled “Sexual”—no real mystery what this infectious pop song is about. Neiked is the stage name of Swedish producer Victor Rådström. When he released this song in June 2016, he offered a simple Facebook post:

I hereby wish everyone a happy sexual summer with my new single “Sexual”. Listen and share like crazy.

Listeners didn’t need much convincing to play “Sexual”—it garnered more than 2 million streams in its first month. “Sexual” was Neiked’s third single and his most popular by far. The single reached #32 in Sweden and #5 in the UK.

The female voice on the track belongs to Dyo, a British singer Neiked called a “pure talent” on Facebook. Born Dayo Olatunji, Dyo was previously known as Ms. D. Under that name, Dyo guested on two chart-topping UK singles by British rappers: Chipmunk’s “Oopsy Daisy” and Wiley’s “Heatwave.”

songs.embed_content: Read “Sexual” by NEIKED on Genius

album.full_title: Best of Hard Drive by NEIKED
album.name: Best of Hard Drive

songs.lyrics:
42 ContributorsSexual Lyrics[Verse 1]
You got that thing that I been looking for
Been running around for so long
Now I caught you, I won't let you go
You got that thing that I been looking for
And you got a heart full of gold
And that's really turning me on

[Pre-Chorus]
You are, you are, you are, you are, you are
Everything that I dreamed of, now we can paint our picture
You are, you are, you are, you are, you are
Making my life much greener, yeah yeah
[Chorus]
Just say you feel the way that I feel
I'm feeling sexual, so we should be sexual
Just say you feel the way that I feel
I'm feeling sexual, so we should be sexual

[Verse 2]
You got something that I ain't seen before
You've opened a million doors
All I can say is I adore you
You got something that I ain't seen before
Hold me 'cause baby, I'm yours
Oh, I can't wait until we get home

[Pre-Chorus]
You are, you are, you are, you are, you are
Everything that I dreamed of, now we can paint a picture
You are, you are, you are, you are, you are
Making my life much greener
So I wanna say, yeah

[Chorus]
Just say you feel the way that I feel
I'm feeling sexual, so we should be sexual
Just say you feel the way that I feel
I'm feeling sexual, so we should be sexual
You might also like[Bridge]
I don't know what you done but I can't get enough
'Cause you give me that rush, I don't want it to stop

[Chorus]
Just say you feel the way that I feel
I'm feeling sexual, we should be sexual
Just say you feel the way that I feel
I'm feeling sexual, we should be sexual32Embed

songs.title: Sand & Lead

description.plain:
“Sand & Lead” is a song by Swedish producer NEIKED, featuring singer-songwriter Brolin. The track was released on February 3, 2016 through NEIKED’s own label, NEIKED Collective.

The lyrics talk about commitment in love and having a balance between the two partners.

body.plain:
“Sand & Lead” is a song by Swedish producer NEIKED, featuring singer-songwriter Brolin. The track was released on February 3, 2016 through NEIKED’s own label, NEIKED Collective.

The lyrics talk about commitment in love and having a balance between the two partners.

songs.lyrics:
11 ContributorsSand & Lead Lyrics[Verse 1]
Find me at the water's edge if you wanna
See you on the ocean bed if you're gonna
Fill my boots with sand and lead if you wanna
Fill my boots with sand and lead
Shall I bring the torch to kill the shadows?
I'll take the wheel if you do the pedals
Bobble back and forth, the spirit levels
Fill my boots with sand and lead

[Pre-Chorus]
Who do you hold on to
When we're passing through
And the air so fine?
[Chorus]
As the city sleeps, we can all be free
Will you follow or break away?
Simple even sea, whispers on the beach
Will you follow or break away?

[Verse 2]
Find me at the water's edge if you wanna
See you on the ocean bed if you're gonna
